skill.Thieving.name: Thieving
skill.Thieving.perk.level_3: Chance to get Universal Neutrals when stealing.
skill.Thieving.perk.level_6: Chance to get Universal Likes when stealing.
Thieving5a.name: Pickpocket
Thieving5a.desc: Direction does not affect steal chance
Thieving5b.name: Robin Hood
Thieving5b.desc: Chance to not loose friendship when stealing
Thieving10a1.name: Highwayman
Thieving10a1.desc: Can steal from multiple people around you at once.
Thieving10a2.name: Mugger
Thieving10a2.desc: Gain Life and Stamina when you steal
Thieving10b1.name: Phantom
Thieving10b1.desc: Chance to get better items from stealing
Thieving10b2.name: Rogue
moonslime.Thieving.Cooldown.apply: You can't steal for a bit after your last attempt.
moonslime.Thieving.Cooldown.on_cooldown: You can not steal right now.
You can not steal right for another 10 minutes.
You can not steal right for another 20 minutes.
You can not steal right for another 30 minutes.
You can not steal right for another 40 minutes.
You can not steal right for another 50 minutes.
You can not steal right for another 60 minutes.
You can not steal right for another 70 minutes.
You can not steal right for another 80 minutes.
You can not steal right for another 90 minutes.
You can not steal right for another 100 minutes.
You can not steal right for another 110 minutes.
You can not steal right for another 120 minutes.
You can not steal right for another 130 minutes.
You can not steal right for another 140 minutes.
config.ThiefIcon.tooltip:
Changes the icon of the thief skill on the skill page. 
THIS REQUIRES A RESTART TO WORK.
config.MonstersOnly.tooltip: When this is set to true, you can never Steal from villagers.
config.Key_Cast.tooltip: Press this key to steal NPCs when near them.
config.ShortCoolDown.tooltip: This makes it so Scaring/Thieving only ever has a cooldown of 10 minutes instead of a variable cooldown
config.ExpMod.tooltip: This will change how much exp all other options are multiplied by
config.ExpFromFail.tooltip: If you fail at Scaring/Stealing, you will get this much exp.
config.ExpLevel1.tooltip: How much exp you get at a tier 1 success
config.ExpLevel2.tooltip: How much exp you get at a tier 2 success
config.ExpLevel3.tooltip: How much exp you get at a tier 3 success
config.ExpLevel4.tooltip: How much exp you get at a tier 4 success
